name: SHUA Tarot
description:
Discover Tarot SHUA, a very exciting trick taking-game, very popular in France and French speaking countries. Tarot is no way inferior to famous games like Bridge.

Tarot SHUA, the best Tarot game on iOS, is a game in accordance with the rules published by the French Federation of Tarot (FFT).

- Play against high-level AI players including a Duplicate mode.
- Play Online on SHUA.fr.
- Play on LAN (Wi-Fi or Bluetooth).

Rules of Tarot are included into the application.

For any question regarding the application : support@shua.fr

Have fun playing Tarot!
